Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an invalid hashing algorithm
        is specified.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA, b'', b''
kwargs = {'padding_method': enums.PaddingMethod.OAEP, 'hashing_algorithm':
    'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    "The hashing algorithm 'invalid' is not supported for asymmetric decryption."
    , engine.decrypt, *args, **kwargs)
